name: DEM CUBES
description:
You are a cube. 

Your goal is to reach the red zone. Once you reach it you go into the next level. 

You will have to dodge obstacles and not to fall of the edge.

The game has 5 levels, each one harder than the previous.  

(It may crash or bug sometimes, but it's very rare. If you find a bug, please put it in the comments and i will try to fix it)

Enjoy!

PS: I might do a second part of this game so stay tuned!
